entry.title: Silicon Milkroundabout 11 Round-up
entry.content:

This is not new information, and I was fully aware of the momentum of the industry that I’m in. This is also not my first time at Silicon Milkaroundabout. Silicon Milkroundabout (which I’ll shorthand to SMR) is a tech job fair which boasts to...

entry.title: Anybody On?
entry.content:
Ever been curious if anybody is currently looking at your website, watching your YouTube video, or on using your mobile app RIGHT NOW, but can’t be bothered to open up and sign into Google Analytics?

I’ve recently launched this blog, my portfolio website and a few...

entry.title: Datarize My Life
entry.content:
Hi, my name’s Andy and I’m a dataholic.

It occurred to me that I may use too many apps. For some reason, I feel the need to obsessively monitor, track and quantify every recordable aspect of my life. I use Swarm/Foursquare to record my locations, Untappd for beer, MyFitnessPal for...

entry.title: Keeping Fit as a Programmer

entry.title: Learning to be Creative
entry.content: I’ve been doing creative things all of my life from playing the piano from an early age, to sketching and digital art, bouts of photography, creative writing and poetry, composing pieces of music, and web development to name a few.
